subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Patrik Elias scored a power-play goal with 7.3 seconds remaining in overtime to give the host Devils a 2-1 victory over the Montreal Canadiens Wednesday night.
snippet: Patrik Elias scored a power-play goal with 7.3 seconds remaining in overtime to give the host Devils a 2-1 victory over the Montreal Canadiens Wednesday night.
